title: Bloomberg Markets: Pascualy Sees Summer Calm for Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Pascualy Sees Summer Calm for Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Putri Pascualy Managing Director and Partner Pacific Alternative Asset Management (PAAMCO) Discussing the bond market and outlook for second half of 2017 for the credit markets, she sees a slow summer and potentially market moving events in the fall.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
